member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.SaveAs(System.String,fyiReporting.RDL.OutputPresentationType)
member.summary: Save the file. The extension determines the type of file to save.
member.param: Name of the file to be saved to.
Type of file to save. Should be "pdf", "xml", "html", "mhtml", "csv", "rtf", "excel", "tif".

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the first instance of the search string.

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.Find(System.String,fyiReporting.RDL.PageItem,fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewerFinds)
member.summary: Find locates the next string after the passed location. Use ScrollToPageItem to then reposition the Viewer on that item
member.param: PageItem after which to start search. null starts at beginning
Multiple options can be or'ed together.

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.LoadPageIfNeeded
member.summary: Call LoadPageIfNeeded when a routine requires the report to be loaded in order to fulfill the request.

member.summary: Hyperlink invoked when report item with hyperlink is clicked on.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.UseTrueMargins
member.summary: When true printing will compensate for non-printable area of paper

member.summary: Show the Wait Dialog when retrieving and rendering report when true.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ShowParameterPanel
member.summary: True if Parameter panel should be shown.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ShowFindPanel
member.summary: True when find panel is visible

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightItemColor
member.summary: The color to use when highlighting the current found item

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightAllColor
member.summary: The color to use when highlighting all

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightText
member.summary: The text to highlight when either HighLightAll is on or the HighLightItem is on.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightAll
member.summary: When HighlightText has a value; HighlightAll controls whether all page items with that text will be highlighted

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightCaseSensitive
member.summary: When HighlightText has a value; HighlightCaseSensitive controls whether the comparison is case sensitive.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.HighlightPageItem
member.summary: When used with HighlightText; HighlightPageItem will only highlight the selected item.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.PageCount
member.summary: Returns the number of pages in the report. 0 is returned if no report has been loaded.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.PageCurrent
member.summary: Sets/Returns the page currently showing

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.Report
member.summary: Gets the report definition.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ScrollMode
member.summary: Gets/Sets the ScrollMode. SinglePage: Shows a single page shows in pane. Continuous: Shows pages as a continuous vertical column. Facing: Shows first page on right side of pane, then alternating with single page scrolling. ContinuousFacing: Shows 1st page on right side of pane, then alternating with continuous scrolling.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.SelectTool
member.summary: Enables/Disables the selection tool. The selection tool allows the user to select text and images on the display and copy it to the clipboard.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.CanCopy
member.summary: Returns true when one or more PageItems are selected.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.SelectText
P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.SourceFile
member.summary: Holds a file name that contains the RDL (Report Specification Language). Setting this field will cause a new report to be loaded into the viewer. SourceFile is mutually exclusive with SourceRdl. Setting SourceFile will nullify SourceRdl.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.SourceRdl
member.summary: Holds the XML source of the report in RDL (Report Specification Language). SourceRdl is mutually exclusive with SourceFile. Setting SourceRdl will nullify SourceFile.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.Folder
member.summary: Holds the folder to data source reference files when SourceFileName not available.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.PageHeight
member.summary: The height of the report page (in points) as defined within the report.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.PageWidth
member.summary: The width of the report page (in points) as defined within the report.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ReportDescription
member.summary: Description of the report.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ReportAuthor
member.summary: Author of the report.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ReportName
member.summary: Name of the report.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.Zoom
member.summary: Zoom factor. For example, .5 is a 50% reduction, 2 is 200% increase. Setting this value will force ZoomMode to UseZoom.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewer.ZoomMode
member.summary: ZoomMode. Optionally, allows zoom to dynamically change depending on pane size.

member.name: T:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.HyperlinkEventArgs
member.summary: HyperlinkEventArgs passed when a report item with a hyperlink defined is clicked on

member.name: T:fyiReporting.RdlViewer.RdlViewerFind
member.summary: RdlViewerFind finds text inside of the RdlViewer control
